strapiPost.title: Four Local Restaurants Are Finalists For the Arkansas Food Hall Of Fame
strapiPost.content:
The 2022 Arkansas Food Hall of Fame finalists were announced this week, and 4 local restaurants are featured. 

  • The pool: There were more than 2,000 submissions from all 75 Arkansas counties for 5 categories of the Food Hall of Fame. The five categories are Arkansas Food Hall of Fame (HOF), Proprietor of the Year, Food-Themed Event, Gone But Not Forgotten, and People’s Choice.
  • Featured: The Northwest Arkansas finalists are Herman’s Ribhouse in Fayetteville for HOF, Neal’s Cafe in Springdale for HOF, Rob Nelson of Tusk & Trotter in Bentonville for Proprietor of the Year, and James at the Mill in Johnson for Gone But Not Forgotten. The winners will be announced on Feb.7. 

For more details, click HERE.
